meanings.sent1: The chiromancers at the fair read my palm and told me about my future.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the abilities of chiromancers to reveal hidden truths through palm reading.
meanings.sent3: The chiromancers at the party had everyone lining up to have their palms read for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her skills as a chiromancer were so accurate, it felt like she could see into my soul through my hand.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious aura surrounding the chiromancers added an air of magic to the event.

meanings.definition: Chiromancers: Those who claim to predict the future by reading palms.
meanings.sent1: I met a group of chiromancers who confidently asserted they could foresee events by studying hands.
meanings.sent2: Some people seek guidance from chiromancers when they are uncertain about what the future holds.
meanings.sent3: The chiromancers' predictions were so outlandish that we couldn't help but laugh at their bold claims.
meanings.sent4: The chiromancers' words seemed to paint a picture of destiny in the lines of my palm.
meanings.sent5: The chiromancers' cryptic whispers about my fate lingered in my mind long after the reading.
